room_title: Escape room "Asylum" by 6th SE6SE Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
room_description: You and Your Team are Self Proclaimed as the Best Ghosthunters around. We would like to turn this old Asylum into an Elegant hotel. After numerous attempts to eradicate unexplainable happenings, You and Your team are being hired as one last attempt to get rid of The unexplained and whatever it is that is Driving Everyone away! Your team will be divided into two groups and separated for the first portion of the game. You can hear but not see the other half of your team. This task will greatly test your communication skills amongst each other. Do you have what it takes to “Escape The Asylum”?
